title: 3s and/or 5s
body:
I need a few people to play some ranked 3s today and moving forward.
I don't want you if you will leave after the first loss or first 5 losses...I want to get through placements with the same group of players, evaluate our weaknesses and improve.
If you do not have communication tools IE curse voice, ts3. raidcall etc get it before you get to the point that we need it. (using Curse currently)
Eventually we can play 5s as well. I have just found its easier to start with 3 and build from there.
If you are interested post below and I will add you. OR add Sheolraver

replies.body: hey im down to join another team i enjoy 3s and 5s so i will play either and was thinking of trying to find people to play with for 3s. Also i use skype i had curse but it kept making my league spike and lag so i uninstalled it but you could add me.
What elo are you looking at? I'd enjoy playing with you (I'm gold 2 atm) and would prefer top/the tt equivalent.
